en.name: Serpent Spine
en.passiveDescription: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal {{6//7//8//9//10%}} more DMG and take {{3//2.7//2.4//2.2//2%}} more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

zh.name: 螭骨剑
zh.passiveDescription: 角色在场上时，每4秒提升{{6//7//8//9//10%}}造成的伤害，{{3//2.7//2.4//2.2//2%}}受到的伤害。该效果最多叠加5层，不随角色退场重置，受到伤害后会减少1层效果。
